mapper.select: select select_value from m_select_info where select_key = #{order_status} and type_code = 'order_get_status'
select select_value from m_select_info where select_key = #{order_type} and type_code = 'order_type'
select name from m_user_info where id = #{blank_audite_person}
select name from m_user_info where id = #{tax_audite_person}

select count(*) from m_product_fast_info where deleted = 0
and id like '%' #{fspdt.id} '%'
and company like '%' #{fspdt.company} '%'
and contact_name like '%' #{fspdt.contactName} '%'
and contact_phone like '%' #{fspdt.contactPhone} '%'
and status = #{fspdt.status}

select m.id, m.company, m.code, u.name receiver, p.name area_province, c.name area_city, z.name area_zone, m.contact_name, m.order_type, m.order_status, m.deleted, m.tax_audite_time, m.tax_audite_person, m.tax_audite_status, m.tax_audite_remark, m.blank_audite_time, m.blank_audite_person, m.blank_audite_status, m.blank_audite_remark, s.select_value as `status`, m.credit, m.credit_real, m.contact_phone, m.created_id, m.created_time, m.modified_id, m.modified_time, m.remark from m_product_fast_info m left join m_area_province p on m.area_province = p.id left join m_area_city c on m.area_city = c.id left join m_area_zone z on m.area_zone = z.id left join m_select_info s on s.select_key = m.status and type_code = #{typeCode} left join m_user_info u on u.id = m.receiver where m.id= #{id}
select select_key as 'key', select_value as 'value' from m_select_info where type_code = #{typeCode}
mapper.update: update m_product_fast_info set `status` = #{status}, modified_time = now(), modified_id = #{modifiedId} where id in #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into m_product_fast_info( id, company, code, area_province, area_city, area_zone, credit, contact_name, contact_phone, deleted, created_time, modified_time ) values( #{id}, #{company}, #{code}, #{areaProvince}, #{areaCity}, #{areaZone}, #{credit}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, 0, now(), now() );
